General.Name: Shanghai Sanmao Enterprise Group Co Ltd B
General.Description: Shanghai Sanmao Enterprise (Group) Co., Ltd. imports and exports clothing, wool fabrics, instruments, and mechanical accessories in China and internationally. The company invests in, leases, develops, and manages real estate properties; and provides network information technology related products and services, etc. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Sanmao Textile Co., Ltd. Shanghai Sanmao Enterprise (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.
